Title: Qudllorful Pigments
Description:
Harvest flowers from bushes and preserve them into dyes.

Learn the Painting skill in Customs And Folklore.

Learn traditional painting styles from different faction in water rituals.

Paint objects and people with the extended interaction menu.

Paint yourself with the interaction menu on any dyes.

Sprite art by CuddlyClover: https://twitter.com/cuddlyclover
